website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and style in a warm fabric jacket.
pros: Good-looking brush knit makes it look more like a sweater
cons: Hip length, but ran too short for some users

customer_reviews.title: This is really something.
customer_reviews.text: I am planning to travel to catch northern lights in Canada and am very worrying about the climate which is below -30C. After a thorough review of softshells, I chose this one. I am not an outdoor person so a bit worried about wearing this after the travel, but that worry went away when I tried on. It fits very well, no point of uncomfortableness, warm, well stretched. Now my only worry is Korea is not so cold in winter anymore due to global warming, so maybe I need to travel out to the cold countries in the winter just to wear this on!
customer_reviews.author: Soyoung L.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cute, but very expensive. I usually fit comfortably in a medium with a little room for layering under, but this definitely fits more like a small. Ideally I would return it for a size up, but I'm lazy and this one fits okay enough so I'm keeping it. Size up if you're unsure!
customer_reviews.author: ChowChowBowWow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fleece to use for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this jacket! Arc'teryx is a quality brand and I own several items by them. This fleece was a nice addition. The fit is athletic/snug but exactly how I wanted it. The material is soft but not the usual "fleece" feel. I would say it runs true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: Good item but smaller...
customer_reviews.text: Different style,different size. The size of this item is smaller than the other item of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chaomeng Wu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: sleeves to long; I guess my arms are short; didn't fit right.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA GARZA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you very warm under a running jacket or other...
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sweater and very warm. Great quality, well-made and durable. Very warm and stylish, and the cut very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: swindella

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter- she loves it! She is in Bozeman going to MSU and said this is a perfect layer, or sometimes her only coat- very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Meagher

customer_reviews.title: Warm and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Pefect fit, warm and a great buy. Love the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: verygood! i am very like it,I will continue to buy!Don't say anything else!Minato words, my English is not good!god please!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunxiao

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this one, it s very warm and the color is so lovely all my friend said it suit me
customer_reviews.author: Jintana

customer_reviews.title: Try this on before you buy it....
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this fleece except it is really short in the front. I would recommend either going up a size or trying it on somewhere else first... but buy it here its about half the price and the exact same product!
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Lehfeldt-Ehlinger

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece - no seams itching or rubbing, fits well, and super warm as a layer. I am short-waisted and find the jacket just long enough, so others may find it short unless they go up a size. Color is absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Clark

product_meta.title: Arc'teryx Covert Hoody Women's
product_meta.description:
Technical Features
- Breathable
- Quick-drying
Construction
- Flatlock construction improves next-to-skin comfort
- Durable binding around the hood and on hem and cuffs
- Alpenex II Heathered fleece gives efficient thermal performance with improved hand feel
Patterning
- Gusseted underarms for mobility and comfort
Hood Configuration
- ScubaHood
Zippers & Fly Configuration
- Full front zip
Cuff & Sleeves Configuration
- Stretch-knit cuffs
Hem Configuration
- Drop back hem
Pocket Configuration
- Laminated sleeve pocket with laminated zip
- Two hand pockets with laminated zippers
Materials
feature_bullets: COVERT HOODY - Unpredictable alpine environments demand clothing with advanced performance and protection.
BREATHABLE MATERIAL - Allows moisture vapour to escape, helping regulate temperature and elevating comfort inside garment.
LIFESTYLE - Technical outdoor functionality, comfort and durability brought to everyday designs.
SYNTHETIC FIBRE - Engineered materials that offer enhanced properties or performance.
